code: import React,{createContext,useState,useEffect,useContext}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();const AuthProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[token,setToken]=useState(localStorage.getItem('token'));useEffect(()=>{if(token){axios.get('http://localhost:5000/api/protected',{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}}).then(response=>setUser(response.data.user)).catch(error=>{console.error('Error fetching user:',error);setToken(null);localStorage.removeItem('token');});}},[token]);const login=(username,password)=>{return axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/auth/login',{username,password}).then(response=>{const{token}=response.data;localStorage.setItem('token',token);setToken(token);}).catch(error=>console.error('Error during login:',error));};const logout=()=>{localStorage.removeItem('token');setToken(null);setUser(null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthContext.Provider,{value:{user,login,logout},children:children});};const useAuth=()=>useContext(AuthContext);export{AuthProvider,useAuth};
